
======================
matter.setupMicroEsym
======================

.. currentmodule:: nucleardatapy.matter.setupmicroesym

.. Don't include inherited members to keep the doc short
.. automodule:: nucleardatapy.matter.setup_micro_esym
	:members:

Here are a set of figures which are produced with the Python sample: /nucleardatapy_sample/plots/plot_matter_setupMicroEsym.py
	   
.. figure:: ../../../version-0.2/nucleardatapy_samples/plots/figs/plot_matter_setupMicroEsym.png
	:scale: 70 %
	:alt: map to buried treasure

	This figure shows the symmetry energy as function of the density (left) and the neutron Fermi momentum (right) for the models available in the nucleardatapy toolkit.
